titles: The troublesome raigne and lamentable death of Edward the second, King of England with the tragicall fall of proud Mortimer: as it was sundrie times publiquely acted in the honourable citie of London, by the right honourable the Earle of Pembrooke his seruants. Written by Chri. Marlow Gent.
author: Marlowe, Christopher, 1564-1593.
publisher: [By R. Robinson] for William Iones dwelling neere Holbourne conduit, at the signe of the Gunne,
notes: Running title reads: The tragedie of Edward the second.
Reproduction of the original in the Zentralbibliothek, Zürich.
Date on title page and colophon has been changed in ink to read 1694.
keywords: Edward --  II, --  King of England, 1284-1327 --  Drama --  Early works to 1800.
